show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: Bonus #6 with Karl T and Seth I 'Soil4Climate'
subtitle: Bonus #6 with Karl T and Seth I 'Soil4Climate'
summary:
Karl Theidmann and Seth Itzkan joined us to talk about thier work on the policy side of things, the Soil 4 Climate group and movement, plus we talk about the Masaii tribe and how they are healing their land and relearning ancestral herding.
We hit rabbit trails about fake meat and the ecosystem benefits of regenerative agriculture.
